resources.string: Welcome to the Bazaarvoice Android. Explore the menu to view example implementions of each component of the modularized SDK.\n\nBe sure to visit our wiki at https://github.com/bazaarvoice/bv-android-sdk/wiki for full documentation
Refer to LocationManagerExample.java for examples on how to tie the Ads SDK into your LocationManager and Geofence implementation.

Gimbal requires registration to gain access to their SDK. Visit the Gimbal Developer Portal to register and download the Gimbal Android SDK. You will need to include their SDK into this app in order to compile the demo code found in GimbalExample.java. Refer to GimbalExample.java for examples on how to tie the Ads SDK into your Gimbal beacon implementation.
"Set %s in DemoUserConfigurationImpl.java in order to view demo"
